lead_paragraph: General Motors said it has decided not to renew its $1 billion sponsorship of the United States Olympic Committee when its contract ends after 2008. The company said the move was a result of changes in its marketing strategy and came after G.M. evaluated the return on its advertising investment. Chevrolet is still a sponsor of the United States Snowboarding Team, and G.M. of Canada is sponsoring the 2010 Winter Games in Vancouver, British Columbia.
